The tint I had put on my vehicle looks wonderful, I didn't spend a whole lot of cash, and I was in and out in no time. If you want quality work, great deals, and speedy service go to this place. You will get what you pay for, and not have any unexpected hassles, or problems...I will definitely recommend Access Sun Control to anyone I know!!!

name: Cindy Hosea
text:
As of today I would not recommend them.  Two weeks ago I went in to get a new radio for my car.  They promised the one they put in with all the bells and whistles would be
perfect.  Well the radio came in with wrong parts as they had reorder that was fine.  Finally they had all they needed although they kept calling saying you need this and that we said ok.  We took my car to them and they had it 4 days.  Finally after a lot of phone calls they said it was done.  It tried to sync my phone and it did but no sound out of the speakers.  They couldn't figure out the problem so the installer promised he'd call the manufacturer Monday morning and call me.  No phone call.  I called him and got his voice mail.  No return call.  I called the shop and was told they would call as soon as he got in .  No call.  I also called Sirus to have that transferred from my other radio but they didn't hook it up.  So here I sit with a very expensive radio and CD player.  At this point the ball is in their court and I'm waiting to see what they do. Until then I would no recommend them to anyone.
I now will give them 5 stars.  They have fixed my problems and everything works perfect.

I would go to them again.

name: Jamal Jamal
text: Took an after market radio there to be installed in place of another after market radio already installed. The owner himself installed it and he did it in less than 15 minutes. Great deal right? Wrong. I already had a back up camera installed and hooked up to the old system. Dude didn't hook up the wires of the back up camera to the new system he installed. I was in a rush so left and came back another day. Dude tells me the new system didn't have an back up camera input. Yea Right. I wouldn't have bought the system if that was the case. I take it to an Audio shop that I use all the time to get all my stuff installed including the other after market radio that was replaced by the new one. They call me to the back and show me where the wires where just thrown in the back of the dash versus using just 1 cable tie and where on the back of the system, it clearly has a wire and and input that says CAM. Not to mention they gave me a dash kit that fit the radio so you can't see the gap between the head unit and the dash board. I've gotten a lot of cars tinted here by other workers, but never had the manager himself work on my car and never got electronics installed here and will never again. How you own a shop but your workers do a better job than you? Hope ya enjoy that over priced $ 75 cux it's the last dime you getting outta me.

name: Patrick Facchine
text:
DON'T GO HERE!!! GO ANYWHERE ELSE! !

If you don't feel like reading the entire review I understand so the short version is this.
My truck left there worse than it went in and I paid them almost $300 to do that. Lights now don't work, instrument lights don't work, if I turn the AC on after starting the truck it resets the audio system. Wires hanging, trash left in the truck and really, REALLY poor service and lack of respect. When I told the owner about the problems and that I simply wanted a refund for labor only  because I don't feel comfortable letting them back into my wiring he said "good luck bro! Try and get your money back and I'll sue YOU!".
I never want back because after checking the receipt it clearly says no refunds which makes sense when you do work like this.

The quality of workmanship AND professionalism was and still is the worst I've ever encountered.
I have NEVER written a review and I'm 30 years old and have dealt a lot in business. The fact that I'm writing this review is an extreme for me.

The stereo system they " installed " for me is very cut and dry.  I supplied the head unit, subwoofer and amp for '02 Tahoe. When I called to make an appointment they said come in first thing Monday (I called on Friday ) and this wasn't a problem for me.
When I called Monday morning to find out why my fiance was waiting in the parking lot for 45 minutes just to see someone they told me they're audio guy doesn't work Mondays but "they'll make it work".
After 4 hours of "installing" she finally left. When I got home from work and inspected the work I found the following:

1) Wires freely hanging run across my pedals.
2) The sub and amp were installed on the wrong side of the vehicle after being told 5 times and told to 3 different employees where to put it. I even set it up on the side I wanted it on and they put it opposite.
3) I was told they tune the system before it leaves the shop. They're " tuning " involved them turning everything to the maximum capacity and leaving it. Dangerous to any electronics.
4) They didn't have the materials needed to do a professional installation on my head unit (which is a $650 Kenwood double din) so I still have spaces beside the unit and looks like ass and nothing like a factory install like they assured me it would.
6) Left trash wire and clippings all through out my truck. When I mentioned this the OWNER told me "there was already trash there." There wasn't. I keep a clean truck. And when I mentioned the poorly ran wiring he told me it couldn't be because he did the wiring HIMSELF! !

I could list more but you get the idea and as I said I don't write reviews. Please take my advise and do not use this place. It's now costing me double to have someone else fix their handy work.

name: Kelly Reese
text: Too expensive and two week estimated wait time for appointment.

resp.text:
Kelly, I think you have us confused with another company. I have looked through my Quickbooks quoting system and I don't see a quote for anyone with your name. I went back and checked my voicemails and you left a message asking for a quote on Mar 14, 8:38 AM for tint on a 2015 Honda Accord. We don't tint cars, only homes and commercial buildings, so it's likely I wouldn't have returned your call. The quote you got wasn't from our company. If you could remove this negative listing I would appreciate it.

Our bids while not necessarily the lowest, always reflect the high quality USA made tints we sell, the difficulty of the work, our quality craftsmanship and lifetime warranty which results in a fair value to our customers. We also always set expectations of 5 - 10 business day before an installation can be started since film may need to be ordered, processed, received, precut and then scheduled along with other projects for other customers. Sometimes if we have the film in stock we can get to the customer in 1-2 days depending on the circumstances. I find it odd that we would have all 5 Star ratings with every other customer, but only a 1 Star from you even though you didn't even use us. I also notice you posted a 5 Star review for another tint company who averages only a 2.4 Star review from his other customers. This competitor also only tints cars, while we only focus on commercial and residential buildings. Car tint should never be put on a building and building tint should never be put on a car. This might explain a large price difference, but again, I don't have a quote for you in our system. Our list of satisfied customers includes Alabama Power, BJCC, B'ham Water Works, B'ham Zoo, B'ham Museum of Art, U.S. Federal Reserve Bank, Hugo Black U.S. Federal Court House, UAB, UA, Samford and hundreds more business's and home owners.

text: Mark is very unpolite and unprofessional. I had power locks installed in my vehicle by him in 2014 (dealership referral). I have since had to have my locks serviced twice because they have stopped working. I called Mark back this week (Wednesday) because they stopped working for the THIRD time and he was extremely rude with me. When I called him to inform him about the locks having issues again his response was "Well I'm a one man team and I'm booked solid"... insinuating that he didn't want to assist me. I asked him when he had availability and he informed me to bring my vehicle in at 11am on Saturday and that he would "get to it by the end of the day". I'm not really sure why he couldn't have been more polite by simply saying "I have an opening this Saturday".   His negative attitude and poor customer service on the phone led me to seek someone else to take my car to. He then leaves a voicemail on my phone saying "You had an appointment at 3 and I never heard from you. I wish you had let us know because that appointment could have been given to someone else." I was informed to bring my car in at 11 and he would get to it, not that I had a 3pm appointment. His attitude is a sure way to LOSE A CUSTOMER and his work IS NOT SATISFACTORY.

text:
My car radio system completely died on me, My father took my car to this "award winning" business to get a new one installed. They did a terrible job, the sound jumps from speaker to speaker all over my car. They CHEATED MY FATHER OUT OF $400 + DOLLARS. My two expert car friends said that the job could have been done for no more than $280. They took advantage of him and took his money. The person I spoke too on the phone to tell them of their lousy job was semi-rude to me. They said if I brought my car back in for them to fix what they did not do correctly, there would still be a charge, and that it would take 4+ hours to "strip and locate" a part in my car that my best friend found in 4 minutes. If this business is "award winning" then why did they do such a lousy job? Stop false advertising.

Do not use this company, they will do a terrible job, and CHEAT YOU OUT OF YOUR MONEY.  :-)

text: I don't know who or why 1 person would give Audio Creations a bad review but, in my opinion, they must be crazy! I shopped around and found Audio Creations to be VERY fair priced and customer accommodating. It was estimated to take about 2 1/2 hours to install my stereo, backup camera and associated devices. They gave me a "loaner" vehicle to use while they worked on my car. The installation is perfect. Sound is fantastic. Service outstanding. I'm a HAPPY customer.

text: Great place to get your car audio done. Mark really knows his stuff installed my whole system and tinted my windows. I am loving both the sound of the stereo is one of the best I have ever had and I have had a lot of systems over the years. Even had a problem with one of the speakers lost connection took it back and he had it fixed in a hour and did not charge me. Will definitely be going back when I need anything

name: Trevor Motes
text:
The guys there are great, had the guy build a custom box that did not even exist on the market for my '11 Silverado  (a single 12 ported box that only went under the 60 "of the 60/40 portion" of the flip seat). That way I still had some floorboard when I flipped up the 40 section of my rear seat. Anyways, he tuned  the port to the best frequency possible with what little airspace and volume I gave him. After a month, the sub finally broke in and got lower. Single Memphis 12 with Kenwood amp.

Fast forward 7-8 months later, I realized I had no bass, without diagnosing anything I dropped it off. They were slammed busy for that afternoon but didn't hesitate to diagnose and fix my problem. 30 minutes later I get the call that it's fixed. It was just a simple fix, the speaker cup had got a little hot and melted. They swapped it out no charge. Doesn't get any better than that in the car audio world. A somewhat custom job for a reasonable price, and they stand by their work.

resp.text: thank you for the great review we try very hard to do the best job possible..again thank you for noticing ...

text: I just picked up our 2016 F-150 earlier from having a full audio upgrade plus 2 subs installed. Let me assure everyone, Mark is a beast. We weren't considering anything else to be done to the truck, but now since it sounds like a movie theater and looks so clean, we are going to have him install dvd headrests, too. text: Mark, the installer, very friendly and knowledgeable. Fast service. Left car clean after installation. Only thing was, I purchased a SAMSUNG RADIO and upon attempting change of radio with SirusXM, was informed the radio was an older radio that didn't allow the newer features, however, it was features I really never used.

name: Felix Marshall
text: I have known Mark from the very day he opened his business which went by Tint 'Em. I actually met his wife before I met him, although I'm not sure they were married or even acquainted that early on. I was in contract food service and she worked in a similar profession dealing with conventions and such. These are people of high moral character. Mark has done my window tinting, alarms, remote start feature, and some small bit of sound systems. I would like to tell you what you can experience from doing business with Mark, but it's much easier to tell you what you will not experience. With Mark's expertise, in his line of business, you can expect NOT to bring your vehicle back in a second time because of something that was not quite right. He is very conscientious about his work and takes pride in the job that he does although you will likely not see that side of him for his humble personality gets in the way of that. My oldest son is a die hard customer of Mark's but his thing is the sound systems in his vehicle. Whether it's me or my son, when we trade cars/SUV's, the first stop is Audio Creations. I have never considered his prices to be anything other than reasonable except for times when I've asked him if he is actually coming out ahead based on the charge. Never does he overcharge or do any unnecessary work. Here is a long story that I will attempt to give you the readers digest version. Some years ago, I bought a used suburban for my wife when she retired. A '99 suburban had a 40 gal gas tank & here is the significance of that. It had been very well kept up & as soon as we took possession from the individual the first stop was to see Mark. He pulled it in the shop & began work on the window tint, alarm, & remote start. A couple of days later when he finished, & went to start the truck & pull it out of the garage, it wouldn't start! What kind of electrical mistake had he made while installing the alarm & remote start? NONE!! Who would have thought a fuel pump would go out after the truck was pulled into the shop & the ignition cut off? That would not have occurred to anyone. Mark back tracked all the wiring to the point where the truck was before his work began. That took hours & hours, in fact days, but at that point we knew it was mechanical. I had the suburban towed from his shop to my auto mechanic, James Daniel, who by the way is just like Mark when it comes to excellence. He knew right away that on that long suburban with the 40 gal tank, it could be nothing else but a fuel pump. After replacing the fuel pump, it was back in Mark's hands to put the alarm system & remote start back in a second time & he asked for no additional charge. I did however pay him extra but not near enough to compensate for all the time & trouble that he went through. One last thing, I don't do business with anyone that I cannot establish a solid friendship with. Mark is my friend first, & my special, tech, tint, alarm, person second. He knows his stuff & you & your vehicle are in good hands with Mark. No one better.Very recently he even came to my house when I was out of town and my wife called him because my suburban, my Chevy Z truck, and even my Harley would not start. Before I left for my out of town trip I suspected I was having a problem with my alarm on our '04 suburban that he put in '09. It wasn't. In all three cases it was the batteries. He found my battery charger in the garage and got the suburban up and running so my wife was not stranded. His kindness in making a "House Call" given the circumstances was more than gracious. My wife had to twist his arm to get him to take even a small gratuity. This is the mark of CHARACTER!! This is MARK PICOGONA & Audio Creations.!!!! Let me close with a few words that are seldom heard these days, Trust, Integrity, and Ethical business practice. F. M.

text: The owner of this shop is a liar. No questions asked he will tell you one thing then do another. 2 experiences with this shop and I am extremely disappointed. The owner is very unprofessional and once again will lie to your face. I do not recommend going here.

name: Ryan McElroy
text:
I'd recently tried to install a new stereo head unit in my car. Long story short, after hours of effort and frustration, I decided to call Audio Creations to have a professional finish the job.

I arrived at around 5:50 (10 minutes before close) and Mark corrected my wiring mistakes. He also finished locking in the stereo and made sure it all was functioning correctly. Even with how quickly he worked, I'd showed up so close to closing that it was past 6:00 by the time it was finished.

Not only did Mark stay past close to fix my problem, he also refused to accept any payment! There's not a place in Birmingham I can think of that would do that, much less an establishment built on highly skilled labor like a car electronics and tinting shop.

There's no question that Audio Creations will be the first place I go to in Birmingham for my next sound system upgrade. These positive reviews are not a fluke - go here before anywhere else!

Just Very unhappy with the equipment. Yes this was a few years ago but for the money I paid for tint and sound system I espected better service!! name: Gary Fondren
text:
Excellent Job from a true professional.  If you’ve been thinking about getting your windows tinted,  this is the place and it’s time to go by.
Bob, is a perfect example of tradesman who knows his craft and will tell you the truth.
I think he has 30 or 40 years of experience tinting windows and doesn’t need to rely on Fancy equipment or computers. He is a perfectionist and will not let you down
Also the quality of window tint is Awesome. We can already tell a difference from how much cooler the car is inside after baking in the sun all day.
Great Job Bob.  .

name: Jacob Salmon
text: Super friendly and very knowledgeable staff. Did an awesome job on our 2017 Armada. Highly recommend and would definitely use them again!!!

name: Jake Leurck
text: I would definitely recommend for auto tinting! Very friendly and professional! Plus my truck looks great!

name: Kristin Ritchie
text: Had the tint re-done on my Civic last year and it was not done well at all! I am still finding pieces of the tint in my car. So many things done wrong...scratched my back window, left gap in the front tiny tinted area, left adhesive where they removed my front strip, and worst of all - drenched my car so much it smelled gross weeks later. He complained that he had to work so hard to remove back window tint when I picked it up. Just seemed like a rush job. Being new to the area and seeing positive reviews online, I thought it would be great but I do not recommend them at all.

name: Damien Dykes
text: I went In and was asking about my 2014 Acadia and was told it would be almost 500 to tint it. They told me the rear half needed to have the tint removed and it would be 100 even after I told them it was just dyed glass and there was no tint on it. I asked what brand film they were using and they said it's called solar free and it's one of the best ceramic tints. well I googled it and from what I can read it's some of the worst and cheapest film ever. I would not recommend this place because they lie to people and use garbage tint when they say they are using premium.

name: Kayla Scalese
text: Had my windows tinting here. They were super nice and had the best experience. Would highly recommend to all friend’s and family. 10/10

name: ejwareagle10
text: Terrible service. Set up an appointment, and the day of, they rescheduled via text. Went there a couple of days later for my new appointment and nobody showed up.

name: Deborah Breland
text: Bob did a great job tinting Abbys windows and we would recommend him to everyone!

name: Dorothy Jensen
text: Ray and Abe did a wonderful job installing drapery panels and plantation shutters.  This is our third purchase from Budget Blinds, and every time we have appreciated the professional and friendly service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and continued business. We really appreciate it!

name: Mike Lovell
text: We are new to the area and updating our home here in Gulf Shores. We had 4 sets of French doors that had older drapes that were past their prime. We called this company and Alex came to our home. His professionalism and knowledge of the products was very impressive. We came to an agreement on product and price which was more than fair in my opinion. Alex ordered our new shades which were all odd sizes and had to be custom cut. Our installer, Abe came out as soon as they came in and did a great job taking the old drapes down and installing our shades. This is a first class company, and I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review and choosing us for your window treatments in your home!

name: Robert Bois
text: We decided on Plantation Shutters for our new construction home in Foley. We went with Budget Blinds primarily because of their very good reputation and the fact that their salesman, Alex, was so knowledgeable and he was able to guide us through many decisions we needed to make to get the end product we thought we were looking for. Naturally we had to wait a few weeks as each of our blinds needed to be custom made. However, in the mean time, Alex installed temporary blinds in our home that worked wonderfully and held us over till the day of install. The install was done by Abe and Cameron and simply put, I don't think we could have asked for anyone better in terms of skill, professionalism, and personality.  BOTTOM LINE: We simply could not be happier with the quality of the product, the install, and the LOOKS! Thank you ever most kindly Budget Blinds!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We love the great team that we have and appreciate hearing your kind words. It was a pleasure installing your window treatments.

name: Dottie Lee
text: We love our new plantation shutters from Budget Blinds.The customer service from them is awesome.From our great salesman Alex to our great installers Abe and Dennis. They treat you like family and are so attentive to detail. Five stars!

resp.text: We are so happy you love your new shutters! Thank you for choosing us for your window treatments.

name: Peggy Barton
text: We had living room blinds installed by Phil and Cam.  They were awesome.  They worked hard, were very polite, punctual, and very efficient.  They both wore masks, took their shoes off on the carpet, and cleaned up afterwards.  They did an amazing job!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Mary Bynum
text:
Thanks to Budget Blinds of Baldwin County for installing all of our home window treatments! Absolutely first class service from ALL team members!
Dennis, Ray, Austin, Phil, truly represent th a " A" team !!! We highly recommend them, Harry & Frances B.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We hope you have a great weekend.

name: Paula Rigsby
text: This is the second time we have used Budget Blinds.  Phil was great to work with and gave me great ideas.  The installers were here yesterday and installed shutters and shades.  They were very professional, efficient and respectful.  I highly recommend Phil and Budget Blinds!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mrs. Rigsby!

name: Sheri Hines
text: Phil was amazing! Helped us select the perfect blinds for our master bedroom with four giant windows and french doors. The finished look is beautiful and just what we wanted. The process was easy from requesting an inital visit through to installaion. Phil is friendly, courteous, communicative, timely, and most of all a joy to work with. I fully receommend Budget Blinds of Baldwin County.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Lundy Wilder
text:
Ask for Alex ! The others at Budget Blinds may be great also but I KNOW that Alex is !  I finally had my home-made goofy shades in my bedroom replaced with beautiful sleek roller shades. Alex was great at helping me find some that blocked most of the hot summer sun but allowed me to see the trees and what was going on outside. The color is a perfect match for my walls and it turned out to be the less costly line they carry, which was a bonus.
Alex is punctual and returns calls and took my old plastic straw shades off to put in their recycle bin and he removed all packaging when he left.
He has a great attitude and is a pleasure to be around. Great experience all around.

name: Lindsay Pileggi
text: Budget Blinds is the best!  I was contacted within a day of submitting a Request Online through their website.  They set up an appointment with a Consultant to meet at my house.  The Consultant Phillip was on time, friendly, professional, and very knowledgeable.  He was able to go through the various options of Blinds available for purchase, and gave me comparisons on pricing and quality of each selection.  Working with Budget Blinds was the best experience.  And the best part, Pricing was not outrageous!  Why try to hunt someone down at your local hardware store?  Call Budget Blinds and let them come to you.  It's so easy!  I will be contacting them again when I'm ready to get blinds for my sun room.

name: Sandy Bookout
text:
We have used Budget Blinds in Birmingham several times. So, when we moved to Gulf Shores I went in search of a Budget Blinds close by. And there they were! We have used them twice here and both times have had a wonderful experience. They are easy to schedule an appointment with and they always show up on time. The sales reps are knowledgeable  and very easy to work with. On the day of the install it was pouring down rain. They came to my door, took off their shoes, and got right to work. Wonderful team! Wonderful product. Thanks!
Sandy B.

name: Sean Ferrell
text: We have used Budget Blinds multiple times. We love the woven shades in our home so much, we decided to use their products again in our office! Val has awesome knowledge of their products, and recommended a perfect treatment for our windows in our budget! Their customer service and installation team go above and beyond with their kindness and professionalism. We will definitely use them again!

name: Jane Breaux
text: Highly recommend BB for all your window covering needs! I really enjoyed working with highly competent design specialist Phil Duke who was able to help me select the PERFECT style of drapes and blinds without breaking my budget, and perfect installation of them too! They took plenty of time with me, no high pressure sales, and let me decide what was best for the space! I look forward to working with Phil and BB again in the future for more great blinds!

name: Chi EK
text: Very professional and competent at their job. Our blinds were hung with the utmost care and concern. We even received hands on review on how to take care of them, removal and putting back if and when necessary. Thank you for a job well done. We would use them again.

name: Rick Johnson
text: Shopped quite a bit looking for professionalism, price, and quality.  Look no further.  Budget Blinds has a superior product and team.  Alex consulted us on the right blinds and shutters, and personally installed them.  They not only look great, they really set the look of the house off.  Hats off to Alex and the whole Budget Blind Staff!

name: Anya Babb
text: We used them twice. The first time everything was perfect. On our second home the shutters were horrible they used a bunch of caulking that cracked and let a lot of light through. Paid nearly 6 grand and regret it.

name: Darleen Hatt
text: The solar shades are perfect and Phil Duke is a Master installer and artist if you can consider installing blinds an art as well as a science and I do.  I could not ask for a better job, nicer sun shades, or better services.  Thank you, Darleen Hatt

name: Angie Monteleone
text: Love my new cellular shades.  This company is great, from the office, to the salesman and finally the installer.  Very friendly and professional.  I highly recommend.

name: Patricia Cooper
text: Excellent product and excellent service.  Installers arrived right on time and were neat and courteous.  I would definitely recommend Budget Blinds of Baldwin County.

name: Ann Rasmussen
text: The people we dealt with were very professional, knowledgable and courteous. The products we purchased- sun shades and shutters, are of a great quality. I would definitely recommend them, and Budget Blinds of Baldwin County, to anyone interested in window treatments.

name: susan Storey
text: Phil did a great job with the design, fabric choice and a professional job with the installation.  MUCH appreciated, and highly recommend Phil and Budget Blinds to anyone with window treatment needs.

name: Linda “Linds” Johnson
text: We have been very pleased with both professionalism and quality of their product.  A good value that offers a wide variety of options.

text: I brought my brand new car here to get the windows tinted.  They showed me a great demonstration of how effective ceramic tinting can be keeping heat out of your vehicle.  Im very particular with my cars, and ended up very satisfied with the overall work performed.  No air bubbles, no peeling, looks awesome!!!

name: Drew Dixon
text: Great company!  Very friendly, knowledgeable staff that takes the time to understand what you are applying to your car.  Willing to go above and beyond to meet my needs!

name: Bobby Melancon
text: Visited location to get my windows tinted in my jeep Cherokee and wanted a design for my two side windows I didn’t know what I wanted. Immediately with the help of David Stevenson, Ethan Nicholson and Brett Neil who all had a part on Giving me ideas and showing me what was available. The graphics at this location was huge plenty to choose from and clear of ideas on what they could do another words I think if you can take it they can make it. They do car wraps, Window tinting, lettering and signs for windows and they also have some kind of solution for  window/windshield That they can put on also that reframes rainwater or any kind of liquid that gets on your windshield/window that just runs right off without using your wipers. After the job was finished they also detailed the inside of my Jeep and gave me an air freshener. I think that was above and beyond customer satisfaction. Also all work they do is guarantee if something happens due to no fault of your own they will fix And replace if necessary.

name: Michel Coleman
text: Great experience with Phillip and his team creating Coleman Construction’s first car wrap!   Everything turned out better than we thought.

name: Janene Symms
text: This place did a great job on my daughter's car last year.  I have called 8 times now to try and get someone on the phone.  I have left a message 3 times in the past 3 days and I still have not gotten a return phone call.  Seriously, I had cash and was ready to buy.  I certainly understand not hiring someone to answer the phone to save money, but you have to return the customer calls.  Very grateful that your competitors feel the need to actually answer their phone.  I will now be using them.

name: David Chapman
text: These guys are the real deal when it comes to the services they provide. Amazing customer service. Best Tinting in Alabama

name: Daniel Tate
text: Did my Chevy Trailblazer in 2005.  Great job and fair price.  Sent several people that way over the years and they were all happy with it.  Just got a new car and plan to take it to them soon.

name: Melissa N.
text: Just got our cargo trailer fully wrapped and they did great. Super helpful and went above and beyond to getting out unit wrapped in under 48 hours since they knew how busy we are. I'll definitely be using them from now on!

name: Brooke Riley
text: I go to Joseph for all my business needs. He is always eager to help and gets the job done asap. I shop around and his prices can't be beat. Thank you Joseph for always delivering top notch service! - A very happy customer

name: Bruce Tang
text:
Phillip and the guys at Sundown Tint are freaking awesome.

The wrap job he did on my Jeep was phenomenal! What he used as a sticker looks like actual paint. It's THAT good. Keen attention to detail and flawlessly laid down---- you couldn't ask for anything more than that.

I'm coming here for ANY future wrap jobs. No question.

Thanks, Sundown!

name: Collin Hilton
text: The guys over there did a great job on my truck

name: Tommy Daspit
text: I had my car tinted with the ceramic nano tint. It looks great and I can tell a difference with the temperature inside the car. Philip and his team are very knowledgeable and the service was great. I was surprised by the quick turn around. When I've had cars tinted in the past there would be streaks of dried water down the doors inside and out. I have this happen many times and with different companies. With Sundown there was none of that. I was really surprised at how clean it was. I have no worries about referring friends and family to Sundown and I will be back!

name: Bill Brasher
text: Used these folks for several years and vehicles - - always quality work with zero issues.   Have an appointment to do another car upcoming. Now my only source for window tint and wraps.

name: Barrie L. Limerick
text: I could not recommend Sundown more highly. The quality and affordability of their work and the superiority of their products make them hard to beat. I've taken two vehicles to them for window tinting and couldn't be happier. I'd never consider going anywhere else.

name: Kurt Allen
text: They tinted my windows in the middle of June 2013.  I still have the car and drive it everyday.  The windows look as good as they did when it was done.  I will definitely use them again.

name: Harry Giles
text:
This is the second car Phillip has done for us.  I could not be happier.  We made an appointment for a Saturday.  We dropped off the car and picked it up three hours later.  The installation quality was perfect.  Phillip recommends a two week reassessment so there is great quality control if you have any problems.

I really appreciate the care given to our car.

name: Cara Black
text: I love the job Corey and the entire crew did for me.  My car still looks really good and very professional.  I recommend these guys.  Corey was very patient with me and I really appreciate that.  Thank you very much from Cara at ASAP Apartment Locators.

name: Kaitlyn Freeman
text: Couldn't be happier with my tint on my 2017 Civic Hatch Sport. After reading how no shop could get the tint on the back window right due to the spoiler, I was very hesitant, but Sundown did an AWESOME job! This is the place to go!

name: Melissa J
text: My experience(s) with Sundown Tint has never been anything less than exceptional.  The staff is top notch and professional. I would highly recommend Sundown Window Tint to anyone!

text: Friendly and professional.  Great quality window film with a generous warranty at a good price. Highly recommend!

name: Christy Moore
text:
Dishonesty and laziness are one thing, but lying takes the cake.
I hate it when companies lie to people we know that are seeking help, drags someone a long way to come and chat, and has them leave in 3 minutes, terrible customer service, dishonest and unethical, absolutely sickening in my opinion.

name: Ladybug
text:
Veey poor attitude and customer focus

Your condescending response proves my point. You should not have employees working there if they cant provide correct information. I was told on the phone, I could get tint over tint. I get there for my appointment and it's a problem. Just a total waste of my time. Let's get your facts straight..I dont have illegal tint on my car. If a customer wants to put illegal tint on their car, it's free country. I think we are all smart enough to know there's a small chance of getting pulled over but hardly, when I see so many illegal tint drivers every single day. Why? because the po po's have bigger fish to dry.. No help here, I will gladly take my busines somewhere else.

name: Karla Roberts
text:
Mr. Walker  put tint on my 2020 Altima windows. But didn’t have the proper film to do the windshield, that Same day. Said bring it back few days later when film came in, which I did. I asked the young lady should we make sure Mr. Walker remembered how I wanted the strip at the top of windshield. She said don’t worry, he remembers.
When he finished the windshield, it was late and sun setting , It was obvious the strip wasn’t applied to my specifications. I stopped, called told the young lady it was wrong. She very kindly said bring it back and Mr. Walker would correct the mistake.
When I took the car back, Walker told the girl to tall me he would charge me $120 to remove the film, $35 to put the corrected strip on. That’s MORE than I paid for it to begin with!,
Walker was rude,,,he would not come into the office and discuss it. The young lady said, “he would be very angry, situation would just escalate, that I should just pay that amount”.  Which I did not... but as I left, I stepped to the bay where Walker was, and in a few non polite words,  told him how disappointed I was,,and still am that he lied to me, this 68 yr. old woman.
VERY SAD..... needless to say... he did not honor his warranty.. DO NOT GO THERE!,,,

resp.text: Karla Roberts thinks a lifetime warranty means, she can come back weeks after a tint job, and change the size of a sun strip.  this woman is a very bold liar. She was not aware that everything she said to our office manager and the two men in our work areas is all recorded on our security camera system.  She had no complaint about our work, she wanted her sun strip to cover HALF HER WINDSHIELD,,,,after we tinted it two weeks ago, and YES, YOU WILL PAY US TO DO THAT WORK, that’s not covered under ANY warranty. We tried to educate her on what a “warranty is”, and she cussed so much, I had to tell her to leave.  If you ever meet this woman, be very careful, she is uneducated, very loud, yells, and not level headed,she needs mental help.  I do believe she is driving a car to the point that she is a hazard on our roads. When she left our parking lot, she caused my neighbor, the business manager to about collide into others. Karla Roberts needs help with her emotions and driving. The driving hazard has been reported to the correct department in Montgomery.  What this woman has said in above paragraph is 99 percent false. It’s sad how our world now just let’s so many just run around feeling “entitled “, and can lie, lie, lie,,,and  call lies ,,freedom of speech.  We will all forgive Karla Roberts, forgive her dirty mouth, hope she gets help and someone to drive her around. There are many great,nice honorable women in South Alabama, this woman is just not one of them.

name: Joe Ferguson
text:
A true professional that treats your vehicle as his own...no pressure on tint or options available. Sunny South's work is worth the wait (had to have a scheduled appointment, no problem) to have my 2012 Z taken care of correctly.  Meticulous in his work!
Updated 1/18/2021 Return customer for my 2020 370Z ...once again the quality and service was outstanding.  Drove 2.5 hours to have Gavin and staff take take care of my Z's tint.  They beat every estimate in the Nashville area and had the dual task of removing cheap "limo" tint.
Cost really wasn't an issue because I had experience with their quality.  If you want your vehicle treated as your own, prices you can't beat, work and quality control done correctly and a timely turnaround, then Sunny South Tinting, Graphics & Signs is where you should schedule an appointment.

text: Excited to take my fourth vehicle to Gavin for tinting! Who buys a car and gets excited to get window tint? It’s Me! Gavin has always been professional and prompt. From my first time meeting him and having too many questions to each time bringing my vehicles, Ive never been disappointed. He has tinted my Saturn Vue,Chevy Impala,Kia Forte and now my Toyota Camry!! I e never had an issue with his work. The quality is superb and it’s a nice environment. If you need tint, check this business out!!

name: Linda Muzquiz
text: Two thumbs up!!! Thanks so much Gavin! I love my tinted windows!! My Tesla Model S looks so much nicer now and I can't wait to see how the tint will improve the range (AC won't have to work as hard to keep interior cool). Top notch service!  Excellent workmanship! Highest recommendation!!

name: Angel Mae
text: I love coming here to get all my vehicles tinted. He does such a great job & gives you a great price. He did both my Tacoma and my mustang. Recommend him 100% to anyone looking to get their car tinted.

name: Michael Young
text: Gavin did a fantastic job! I only got my two front windows but they look great. I got the 20% tint and it does a very good job of blocking the heat - I notice a significant difference in the internal temperature of my vehicle after work. I was considering getting my windshield done as well, and Gavin was kind enough to put a scrap/sample piece on the top of my windshield so I could see if I liked it. I didn't end up liking it and Gavin took it off for free. My car was ready in about an hour and I received a call and text to let me know. Definitely recommend Sunny South, very professional service and did a great job, plus the product has a lifetime warranty.

name: Bell Haynes
text: Mr. Sunny did an awesome job on my car, he was very friendly and very nice to talk to, patient in explaining how he does the job and the type of work quality he guarantees about his work. I drove almost an hour to have him do the tinting on my car base on the review I read about him, and he absolutely did the job for me.

name: Clarence Ragland
text:
I found this gem of a business searching for a auto tint place to have the front windows of my new F150 tinted. After getting the run around from a "highly rated" business that seemed to think they were doing me a favor by "working me in" if I brought my vehicle to them first thing in the morning and dropping it off to sit for hours, which is unacceptable,
I contacted Sunny South. Gavin, the owner,  who was able to get my truck in that same afternoon.

Gavin did a fantastic job, I have to agree with other reviewers that Gavin, is skilled and knowledgeable, and treated  me and my truck with care. The service was FAST, and excellently done, my truck looks great now that the windows are all tinted and almost match.

Gavin has earned my business and trust, you can't go wrong taking your vehicle to Sunny South!

name: Wendy Adams
text: Gavin was very patient and helpful with my questions.  The tint looks awesome on my car.  My husband and I appreciated his willingness to stay late for us to pick up our car after work.  Very happy with this business and I would highly recommend!  Great customer service!

name: Max Tall
text: Writing a late review since I had work done about 3 to 4 weeks ago but I wanted say excellent work!  The owner was very personable and friendly.  The pricing was much better than a few other competing company's in area not to mentioned he was much more professional than the other companies I spoke with for an estimate.  Thanks!

name: Matthew M.
text: Tinted my CTS V wagon and did an amazing job.  I wish I had known about Gavin and his shop before I had my other vehicles tinted by another shop.  He was professional, prompt and followed up with me to see if everything looked good or if I thought there were any issues.  Of course there weren’t, because he does amazing work!  I will be recommending him to every person I know when they ask about tint, he is easily the best in the city.

name: Aaron Lutz
text: I called 10 days ago to be exact. According to Google maps they are open the time I called but no one answered which is unusual because usually business will have someone to answer phone calls for possible business. So not sure what happened and why. I left a detailed message of my number my vehicle my name and wanted a quote for a service which I wanted to go through doing anyways because I wanted this service done. Finally after 9 days waiting patiently for a call back I went somewhere else. As you can see from the picture I have yet to receive a call back. Hopefully if I want business from them in the future they will 1 pick up the phone and 2. If they don't at least call me back.

text: They do great work at a fair price!!!!!!

name: Jeffrey Baker
text:
Well, here's the short version: ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND.
To give you an idea of the attention to detail paid here: Gavin does 100% of the work himself, and that's normally 2 cars per day, max. But when I called him on a Wednesday trying to get my Tesla done for a Saturday show, he made it happen, despite being booked solid. I dropped her off at 5 on Thursday and he rolled it in to get started that night, and the next morning the job was done.
Not only does it look AMAZING, but I'm running my AC a good 10 degrees warmer to achieve the same comfort. These brutal summer days were pushing it to the limit, even with a fresh recharge, but now I can actually set it to the temp I want and it'll get there instead of struggling. So, not just a great aesthetic improvement, but a real boost to efficiency, meaning I can drive farther on a charge and spend less overall. I'd go back in a heartbeat, and I'd recommend him to anyone I know as well.

name: Cyndie Downer
text: My husband had his truck windows tinted here. They are 40 minutes from where we live, but highly recommended by a friend. Great experience, it was quick, under an hour and it looked great. So we schedule my car for the 1st available appt., a couple of months away. No problem. My husband wasn't able to pay deposit over the phone that day - somekind of trouble with payment system. Female told my husband no problem, we were a repeat customer. Morning of 1 pm appointment I call to confirm time only to find my appointment had been cancelled because a deposit wasn't paid and they had already scheduled another for that time slot. She said he (her husband?) tried contacting me the day before but I had just swapped to a new phone -and my voice mail wasn't set up yet. Next available appt.was in May. I just tell her I'll reschedule, or find another place to have it done. She offered to call if there was a cancellation.  My husband calls them and reminds her that she said the deposit issue was okay. She admits she didn't make a note of it and they can get me in. I take my lunch hour and an extra hour (or so) off from work, drive 40 minutes one way, then when I say I'll just wait while it's being done, he says that it will take 3-4 hours for my sedan. I based my timeline on our previous experience (<1 hour) and we were NOT told on any of the three phone calls leading up to the appointment to expect a 3-4 hour window! They even knew I was driving from 40 minutes away. I am not bashing this business, I am just sharing my experience. You can call this a series of mis-communications and odd events but I call it just poor customer service. We will never do business here again.

resp.text: I'm very sorry for the mix up and your disappointing  experience during your visit.  We tried very hard to accommodate you and were very thankful to the customer who allowed us to open your spot back up. We did not realize that you were expecting your car to be done in the same amount of time as the smaller job we did on your husband's truck. This was a series of unfortunate events for both of us. I hope that you were able to get your sedan tinted and all went well.

text: At first I would have gave 5 stars because they were friendly people they fit me in without an appointment. But then I few months after they installed my music it all started going out one speaker at a time until the point where no sound at all was coming out. So after that I decided to take matters into my own hands because I used to install music myself years ago. upon removing the panels from my doors an getting to the back of the speakers it was obvious that the wiring used on my speakers was very cheap because it had already dry rotted after a few months. I was able to get all my speakers back working again but then a few months after that they're already going back out only two of the speakers are working. so all-in-all I am not too happy about the job that was done on my vehicle.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. King.

Unless we're installing an amplifier or have reason to suspect that there is an issue with the wiring we just use the factory wire that's in the vehicle.

We also give you lifetime warranty on your labor. So if there was an issue you could have brought it back to us to check it out at no charge

text: Could a window tint outfit be more unprofessional or disappointing? I submit to you that Tint Spectrum holds the record for both accounts. They completely screwed up my Z71. The manager tried to sell me illegal tint, bragging that she had 20% on her car and nobody would ever ticket her, because she put tint on all the city police cars and it was illegal also. Yeah, that's what you want to here about local law enforcement. She was generally unpleasant and unprofessional. She shouted at her staff and fussed the entire time. The staff, by the way, were dirty and seemed incompetent. They left bubbles in my tint and blamed it on "water residue". Two weeks later, it's still here. Don't use these people. They are one step above crooks.

text: They took me in on short notice, and did an excellent job on my car even staying to finish it after closing.  The car looks great!  I appreciate the attention to detail.  I recommend them for any tint work you need to have performed.

text: Y’all Need Be Shut down the city will Very soon!!!

name: Caleb Cross
text:
Paid over $200 for a really crappy tint job. Tint has streaks and bubbles. In addition, there is overspray from the solution they used to apply the tint all over the interior of my Accord, in addition to streaks of it running down the doors. They literally sprayed what looked like gallons of this crap on my windows and let it run down through the interior of the door onto the ground. Is that not going to screw up my electrical?

Meanwhile, the woman who was telling everybody what to do was nothing short of a witch. She kept shouting at people, cursing, and was very rude to me. One of the tint guys was making fun of the rims on my car while another kept spitting tobacco juice on the ground all around it. Then the owner lit up a cigarette and went to work on my window, blowing smoke all in my interior.

Why should I pay for this??? Incompetent staff, rude management, and an overall really bad experience. Don't waste your time. There are plenty of good tint shops in town without fooling with these people.

name: Whitney Walker
text: If I could score lower than 1 star, I would. For starters, my boyfriend dropped my car off on a Monday Morning with the promise that the turn around would be no more than 24 hours. As the days pass, he called for an update. After having several phone calls ignored, he finally went up there on Wednesday. The owner had a million excuses as to why the car wasn't complete, while he's sitting outside smoking a cigarette (doing nothing). He then told my boyfriend that he swears it will be done by 5pm the following day. My boyfriend went to get the car at 4:45 and it STILL was not complete, there was 1 window without tint. Of course, my boyfriend is upset and when he expressed his disappointment,  the owner cursed him out like it was his fault. Friday rolls around, it's after lunch and my car is STILL NOT FINISHED😠😠!!  MIND YOU, MY CAR HAS BEEN AT HIS SHOP SINCE MONDAY!!! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THESE PEOPLE. If you pay with credit card they'll ask for a "Cash Deposit" 🤔🤔 I will never refer anyone to them or do business with them EVERRRRR again

name: Tawney Williams
text: Do not use this company! Poor communication between the owner and his employees and them and us should have been my first red flag. The initial estimate almost doubled by the time the job started. Trash and debris left all over my yard every day. Shawty final work that was never inspected by said owner. Finally the work was finished and I had to have them come back out at threat of lawsuit to correct mistakes. Do not use this company!

name: Eli K
text:
This was absolutely the worst experience I've ever had with any car related shop. From the start, I was uneasy about the experience, but I went ahead with it. Huge mistake. I drove by today and a woman who said she was the owner's friend and acting manager waited on me. I asked her to inspect my car to put tint on the driver and passenger windows only. She inspected them and we agreed on a tint grade and a price. Then I walked down the street to the library to wait. About an hour later I decided to head back, and got a call from the manager on my way. She was agitated, and demanded to know if the car had ever had tint on it before. I replied that it may have, I bought it used. She said that they had already started applying tint to one window when they discovered that there was residue from old tint below the window sill. When I got back to the shop, the manager was in a frenzy. She pointed out the residue, and kept going on about how they had "wasted $50 worth of tint". I remained calm and asked them to finish the job. She said they would have to charge me $10 per window extra as a cleanup fee. I refused, saying it was their mistake and they should have inspected the windows more closely before starting (they are the experts, after all). She became very upset and began to shout, again blaming it on me for not telling her about the residue (which, again, was below the windowsill line and not visible). I stood my ground and insisted that it's not my job to know everything, that's why I brought it to a professional. She blew up, began to curse, shout, and refused to look at me in the eye. She shouted at the tint specialist to reassemble my car and send me away. I knew it would cost me even more at another tint shop to have them clean up the messed up tint that was already on my window from Tint Spectrum, so I reluctantly asked the tint specialist what it would take to get the job done right and get be out. He said it would take another $20, so I agreed to pay it. This time, I sat down in the shop and watched them the entire time. I'm not a tint expert by any means, but in my humble opinion, neither are these guys. One of them (who I later found out was the owner) was eating pizza over the hood of my car and asking me whether it was pink or red (it's obviously red). The tint specialist who was working on my car had to rip the tint from the passenger's window, replace it, install tint on the driver's side, rip it off and replace it, and then replace the tint on the passenger's side AGAIN. I'm not sure what he kept messing up, but if each one of those sheets was $50 worth of tint, he easily wasted over $200 worth. The manager continued to stomp around the shop shouting and cursing. The owner didn't seem to care. The tint specialist left lart "3M" logos on my window's right in the middle. The manager asked me if I wanted those removed (who in the world would WANT 3M logos in the middle of their window?).

When it was all said and done, my final bill was $140 before tax, which was $20 higher than agreed upon earlier that morning due to absolutely no fault of my own. The manager remained rude and loud the entire time, and I must have waited in the shop for well over an hour after I got back from the library. The manager offered no apology other than something about "didn't mean to snap earlier". I don't think there is anything in the world that could make me go back to this place or recommend it. The manager is rude, loud, inappropriate and unfair. The staff are very slow, appear to be outrageously incompetent, and are all dirty on top of that (the tint specialist kept spitting tobacco juice on the ground right behind my car). The owner didn't seem to care about anything. I think the quality of the tint is good, since it's 3M. But the service and the installation quality were absolutely not even worth the one star I am forced to grant them. Do not take your car to this place. You will regret it, especially if you have to deal with the manager.

name: jeff love
text: Paid $320 for a horrible tint job.  Windshield strip had a bubble in it from a hair under the tint.  Both small back seat windows have foreign material under tint. Back window has a few small bubbles.  Inside Passenger side door and both back seat door panels were NOT wiped down after installation.  Had shoe prints on back seat. Took it back up to have it fixed and Robby said he would fix the issues, just come back sometime.  I'm thinking I'm here now, fix it now

name: Jeremy Hopper
text: Great guy and better service! Will be going back for all of my future work.

name: Scotty Chang
text: Awesome service! Great work!

name: Joe F. Watson
text: No. Overpriced and less than honest.

name: My Bell
text: He kept saying that he will get back in touch with me and never did.

name: Justin Schroeder
text: Spot on work, always!

name: Jennifer Touchton-Dickens
text: I spent 7 hours here to tint my 2015 Dodge Challenger with legal tint... When I left my car still has a few bubbles in it.... Needless to say, even though I have a lifetime warranty, and I will be returning to get the Tint fixed, I will NOT BE USING THEM AGAIN FOR ANY FUTURE VEHICLES..... AND I'M NOT A HAPPY CAMPER NEITHER

name: Muntileta Dalton
text: Wonderful place

name: Cassie Connell
text: This place is so dirty there is trash everywhere and none of the car wash bays are working. They are shoved full with quarters and I would definitely not suggest going here.

name: Theresa Plunk
text: Not a bad place but they just put in old standard car wash not a hand wash.  They also put a dent in my rear door. As he pulled back up to building from car wash to vacuum.  The man forgot to close rear door.  Pulled forward and my door hit edge of building.  Unfortunately they did nothing about it.  Not even a discount on car wash.  Just an I'm sorry. Guess that's better than nothing.  If I wasn't standing there witnessing it happen I doubt I would have gotten that much.

name: Patricia Knowles-Shreve
text: Dropped my car off to get a inside and out wash, very happy with the results. They even cleaned the floor mats and door panels for me even though it didn’t show it as included! Will probably be back again for a full detail later.

name: Pete Santorelli
text: I've been a customer for 6yrs and this place has always treated me well. They're professional, courteous, and always take care of my vehicles. They are almost always quick with turning around my vehicle. I stick with the full service and get it every couple weeks. Will continue recommending this place!

name: Tim Stewart
text: I was really surprised to read the reviews on here AFTER I had my car detailed. The Bailey Cove location had been recommended by my daughter. The receptionist who made the appointment was incredibly friendly and helpful. I was told the car would be ready at 4:30 and they called at 3:00. I had the ultimate detailing and certainly got my money's worth. The car interior and exterior looks brand new. This was a great experience from scheduling to picking up the car. I was even able to pay with my iPhone using Square which was a novel experience. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them!

name: Courtney Moore
text: Always professional and courteous!!!

name: Brad Hall
text: They do a fine job cleaning, but they used a really strong tropical scent that lingered forever.

name: Red Kerusso
text: Proffessional and seamless cleaning.   They demonstrate a tenacious commitment in making your vehicle look new.  By far the best car wash business I've been to in a while.  Appreciate you and your core values. I bring all my family's vehicles here

name: Carolyn Carter
text: I had the Express Wash last week and was VERY satisfied! They ALWAYS do a great job and are very nice and polite. I've never had any issues and I will continue to drive the hour that it takes me to get to Huntsville, to come here for a great car wash.

name: Will P.
text: I have come to this place for detailing many times and have always been satisfied, the staffs is friendly and professional, and the service is great. I have found early morning is best to save time. I will keep coming back.

name: George Mantis (G-Man)
text:
3 stars for Jones Vallley, 1 star for Madison, averages to 2 stars. The Jones Valley location used to be great. Now they can never even start on your car without at least 2 hours’ wait, regardless of time of day or how busy they are. Under their previous manager, they were fast and always professional, with never a problem. Not any more.

As for Madison... After 8 years of bringing my cars here and nowhere else, I will never do business with them again. I brought my car one day for a full detailing ahead of a lease return. My appointment was for 10am but I brought them my car at 9am. The receptionist told me it'd be done by close of business (5pm). I called at 4:30, and was told 6:30. Then it 6:00 they called to say 7:30. Then at 6:30 they asked if I could wait until tomorrow!?! They had my car ALL DAY and did nothing, even with an appointment. The owner offered only superficial apologies and lots of excuses - "we're very busy" (but I had an appointment!) "it's cold out" "we're not machines." Customers - especially repeat ones accustomed to excellent service - don't want to hear excuses.

name: Jon Bierer
text: Prices are great, service is great. Didn't know they were going to take my car to the wash rack next door to wash, so I was confused at first. They brought it back and detailed it. Looks beautiful.

name: TomKat Fleming
text: Very Disappointed! Using Groupon, I had 2 vehicles washed and waxed at the Jones Valley location  the same day. First, the positive: Both the young man and young lady who waited on us were courteous, friendly, and professional. The wax jobs appear good. The negative: on our SUV, the wax was applied over a non-clean roof and bug splats on the hood. We paid extra to clean the interior of each. This was not the $125 interior detail, just a $12.95 interior cleaning. Not sure what that was to include but since there was an attempt to clean the window and vacuum, I assume that was included. We removed all items from the car to make this easier. On our SUV, the carpet appeared vacuumed in some areas and "untouched" in others. On our sedan, the trunk was not touched. We left empty compartments open for vacuuming/cleaning; that didn't happen. On both vehicles, the seats were not vacuumed.  The interior side of the windows had streaks and smudges. We won't go back.

name: Tory Meeks
text: On the spot has always done a superb job on my truck. I let nobody else touch my truck except on the spot. The customer service is 10/10. The employees always put the customers first, which is something I love most about on the spot. I have been recommending them to everyone for a couple years and will continue to do so.

name: Ingrid Royster
text: Great job!  I just had the 2nd level car wash but the car, tires and carpet look great!  Everything was dusted and the windows look great!! All for $25!!  Super good deal!

name: Shar Saidla
text:
Immediate professional and friendly service!
Thank you for taking good care of me!

name: Kelli Sepanen-Proctor
text: On the Spot is always friendly and professional. I've been coming here for over two years now for their services with my vehicle. They do a nice job of cleaning, waxing and washing.

name: Jessica Koerner
text: I took my car to their University Dr location about a year ago and had a great experience. Not so much at the one here in Jones Valley. I was told the day before that if I dropped my car off before 10am the next day it was guaranteed to be done by 1pm the same day. I wanted a full detail and a headlight scrub, they quoted me $115. I dropped it off at 9:45, and 1pm came and went. Around 4pm no one had called me. I called and they it would be done by 5, and that of course the 1pm was no longer guaranteed. I showed up at 5 and had to wait until 5:30 in the lobby. Then when I went to pay, they added on $65 to the headlight scrub, which was implied upfront would be a part of my detail job. This $65 quote was not on the original estimate, although it was notated they would clean the headlights. Not a fun time!

name: Paul Revy
text: Took my SUV to be detailed at the Bailey Cove location. They took a little longer than the estimated time to do the work, but the vehicle was immaculate when they were done. Recommended

name: Jeremy M
text: I have been using On the Spot Auto Detailing for the last few years.  The customer service has always been great and my vehicle has always been cleaned to perfection!

name: Vitaliy Didyk
text:
Terrible service,I've paid $150 and they didn't even vacuum under the seat or in the back of the trunk but did leave me with a nice dent on the door, they charge top $ to detail the car but seems to me like they don't even know the meaning of that word.
I would highly suggest not to go to that place?do it yourself you'll definitely do a better job and I promise you it won't take as long as it does with those guys

name: Richard Klimas
text:
Excellent business.
Professional, courteous and timely service.
My car didn’t look this good when I picked it up from the dealership, brand new !?!?!
Would highly recommend !!!!!
“ I’ll be back !!!!”

name: Brad McClellan
text: Not sure I'll be going back. The crevices aren't clean, the wax appears to have scratches that weren't there before

name: Forrest Tuttle
text: First time coming here and this place is amazing, I have never seen my car so clean!!!! This is the only place I will take my car for detail and washing for as long as I live in Huntsville.

name: Thomas Hatley
text:
Twice the attendant slammed my transmission into reverse while my car was moving forward.  After waiting in line for 20 minutes before my car was washed, another customer was allowed to pull up and have his car washed while he was sitting in it and mine was unattended.  I was in no hurry, and honestly don't believe saying anything would have gotten me anywhere.  After about an hour and 15 minutes, my car left only slightly cleaner than before it got there.

Simply put.  Avoid this place.  Believe me, I wish I would have.

Edit: I was at the Hughes Road in Madison location.  Cannot speak for the other one

name: Joe Pi
text:
I decided to have my vehicle detailed which they do for $199. I spoke with Brittney on the phone to get details of the work included and to make the appointment. To sum it up, everything except the engine! I made the appointment and wednesday was there at 8:30am as scheduled. No one was there. At approximately 9 am employees showed up and took my car. Inwas told that the credit card scanner wasn’t working so I would need to bring cash.

At 430 i called and was advised my car was done. When i got there I spoke with the man cleaning the exterior of my car. I asked if they cleaned the trunk jambs as I noticed a large deposit of mud when i got groceried the other day. He said yes. I then waited about 10 minutes for my car. I watched the man open the trunk and then wipe the trunk jambs...?

It was an overcast day and the car looked good... until I got home. My chrome exhaust was still black (i rubbed with my finger and it comes off), the fuel tank door was dirty (once again my finger lifted the dirt there), large spots on the chrome grill looked untouched, large spots on the lower door panels were untouched, smears on the windshield,and spots on the rims were untouched. I paid and their CC machine did work... amazing.

I have pictures and videos of all things I mentioned.

I was going to just leave it alone but knowing I paid $200 for a half a$$ job didn’t sit well with me.

I have to say the interior was GREAT! A little excessive with the oils but you can tell they took their time and got everything looking sharp!

On Friday i called and got Brittney on the phone again. I asked for a manager and she said she would relay a message for me. I told her I’m calling to complain about the detail I got... she asked for details and i told her everything. She called back a few hours later and advised that the owner/manager said i can bring the car back. I advised that i didnt have all day to leave my car to be washed and waxed again. (I highly doubt it was even waxed as there was so many spots that were unwashed... the wax would have stuck to it). I told her honestly the interior looked great and id be ok with paying for that service but need to be reimbursed for the remainder. She basically told me that wasnt an option and that thisnis how the manager handled things. He doesnt talk to customers and just has her. I explained that im offering to pay for the work that was done correctly... most customers would just want a total refund. However, if she cant authorize that and the manager wont even talk to me to settle the issue, ill just have my CC company cancel the payment.

I feel sad for Brittney as im sure she is put in this situation often.

My advice, stay away.

name: Leidy Aquino
text: On The Spot Is The Best Place to get your Auto detail ! I will definitely recommend them to everyone ! They will have your Vehicle looking Spotless! best customer experience ive ever had  !

name: Jeff Williams
text:
I wish I read read the reviews before buying.  I went to the small location on Hughes, and they did a horrible job on my car. I got the $60.00 "Supreme" wash. This is the first time I've paid to have my car cleaned and it will probably be the last.

There is a large section on my front bumper they missed. There was cleaning product pooled in my cup holders. It looked like they had just sprayed it on in places and never wiped it off. My dash and console was all spotty, and covered in a mix of dust and cleaning spray. They did not open my hatch and vacuum the back. The front was vacuumed but not well. There was a tone of very fine loose dirt  on my from floor mats. It looked like it came from the inside of the shopvac they used to vacuum the car. I can't believe they use a shopvac for this. I have leather seats, and they did not so much as wipe them down. My back seat had dirt in it from where I had sat a pair of boots. It's still there. There are little spots all over the outside of my car. I suspect that is from the spray wax they put on. I'm not sure.

The worst part is, my car has an odor now. It smells like body odor. I think that may be from the cleaning supplies they use. I don't know. I'm cleaning my car myself this week though. I've got to get the smell out. This place is horrible. I will never go back.

name: Jason Carter
text: Very friendly service. Fast and detailed. My car looks great!

name: Richard Ensley
text: This is the best detail job I have seen in along time, also their customer service was great.

name: Angela Whitlock
text: So I went to get my car seats and carpet shampooed (interior package). First of all, the package was 124.00!!! So right off the back I'm thinking they MUST be excellent at their job. I was sadly mistaken! I dropped the car off in the morning after making an appointment online. I asked the guy on duty about what time the car would be done. He said "about 1pm". I was cool with that. So I left and went to run errands. Around 1:30pm I called the place to find out the status. The woman who answered the phone put me on hold for over 5 min so I hung up and drove to the place to see how things were going. When I got there there was an older woman complaining about a previous job they did to her car. I just remember her saying "someone owes me 10 bucks to fix this". Anyway, one worker sees me and says "would you like to see your car?" I said yes and followed him into the garage. The car STILL had the dark brown stains on the carpets! Before I can point it out he says "I couldn't get it out. You should try dying the carpet." I was upset because the car also looked like they didn't vacuum well... if at all! Then there were dirt spots on my back window. The door jams were STILL dirty! The tires were dirty and the front bumper!  I ran my finger on both and lifted black dirt from those areas! They uses the wrong cleaning material on my middle console that caused paint to come off. I was very upset and dissatisfied snice I left it there for almost 6 hours already! I asked to speak with the manager. I told him this was no where near a good job for that price. After some deliberation, he agreed to knock off 25.00. This was a bit of a relief, but honestly, that was a 50.00 job (at best). THEN... about 2 hours later, that woman calls me back and says "your car is ready for pickup". I told her I already picked it up. She said "oh I guess I called the wrong person". I'm so annoyed with this place! They are so unorganized. Save your money and go elsewhere where they do a job that fits the amount that they are charging you. This was a waste of time. I would recommend Melvins On the Spot Car Wash in Florence, AL if you are in that area. He has had that business for 30 years! They know how to do it right and have better prices!

name: Pat Guettler
text: I won't take my car anywhere else. Great staff. Super attentive to detail.

name: john lang
text:
I read the reviews and was hesitant to buy a Groupon, but I'm pretty low maintenance, so I figured it would be fine. Nope.

3 hours turned in to 8 hours. We had scheduled a 9:00 appointment and I was on the road @ 5:05 after they completed the second car. Initially, they told me around 12:00. I had to kick up a fuss to even get them to begin after 3 hours.

They didn't vacuum the whole car until I asked them about it.

After I got home I discovered they hadn't even washed the roof of the SUV, much less waxed it.

While we were there they lost a center cap off of some guy's BMW. The best they could do was "sorry."

Even with a Groupon discount it was a waste of a day and not even worth the $130 I paid for two cars.

name: Ray Phillips
text: Great car wash they do a good job in a  timely manner don't have to watt long

name: David Schultz
text: Don't waste your time or money on these people. They are extremely overpriced and do a piss poor job. I could have washed my vehicle better with a toothbrush and a garden hose.

name: Lewis Metts
text: Locations in Madison and Jones Valley.  Have used them both.  Fantastic work!

name: Rachel Baines
text:
Absolutely terrible service. Save your money and go elsewhere!

I thought maybe the other reviewers were exaggerating a tad so I decided to give this place a shot and purchased a groupon. Now I'm out $60 and my car still looks terrible. Really disappointed.  Dealing with these people was a nightmare from the get go, and now I'll have to spend more money to take my car elsewhere and have it washed and waxed properly. Do yourself a favor and stay away.

name: Ryan McMahon
text: Great expierence and very clean car! Quick to clean it up too! Thanks!

name: Douglas Meeks
text:
I have 3 cars but I have a 2005 Freestyle that I use for hauling things (like my dogs) and it is never all that clean but one day recently I was picking up one of my dogs after a bath (black haired dog) and they had forgotten to brush him out good and I had a ton of dog hair all in my car and it was overdue for a cleaning.  I took it to On-The_Spot and the guy offered me a price that I thought was too low so I made him come out and look at the mess and he added like $10.  The thing is when they got finished several hours later and I came to pick it up it looked like a freakin' miracle it was so clean (close to new car clean) so I gave them a $20 tip and paid the fee gladly since I could never have done it and even if I had tried to do it myself the finished product would have looked like trash in comparison to the job they did for me.  5 Star service in my book

Douglas C. Meeks
Amazon Top 500 ​VINE ​Reviewer, Goodreads Top 1% Reviewer, Reviewer for  Wicked Scribes and Kindle Book Review

name: Breanna Burt
text: jv location is a great on the spot location.i took my car in to get cleaned earlier today and the guys did a very outstanding job.would recommend them.clean waiting area,smells beautiful,respectful and polite customer service...will see you guys again when i need my car cleaned again

name: XKingXclusiveX Gaming
text: Best on the spot car wash location in Jones Valley

text: Bring my car once a month....they do an excellent job !!!! Only one I trust with my vehicles in ON THE SPOT!!!

text: Did a  great  job, very courteous and got car right in with no wait!

name: Tremayne Gilbert
text: Nice place to get car wash will be back again

name: Elia Lorenzo Canseco
text: Me love this carwash. Great service

name: Wes Cold
text: Great customer service  clean environment great at what they do they will have you in and out fast as well

name: Michael Vollmer
text:
Worst car wash ever. Basically they just spayed it with water. I've used them twice and each time it has came back dirty. Last time they didn't even wax it but charged me $75 for it. Stay away.

I was burned by the groupon scan too.

name: Chad Watts
text: They do a great job. Will be coming back.

name: Daniel Staples
text:
Dp not use this location. (I don't know about the others). I bought the Groupon for the expensive one that says " Supreme Service Wash, Swirl Remover, Polishing Crème, Banana Crème Wax - A FAST AND EASY WAY TO ELIMINATE SWIRLS FROM BOTH FRESH AND CURED PAINT SURFACES. " Its a $135 service so it better be good. NOPE.

The car was kind of shiny but no swirls were removed. In fact, I would say the shining made it look worse than before. The carpet had a basic vacuum but some dirt and dog hair remained in spots. The only bright spot was the dash was well done. I can't imagine they spent more than 30 mins TOPS on the car leaving it the way it was. Not worth even the Groupon discount. Super disappointed. Will NEVER return.

name: edwardcruz82
text: Walked in and was able to get my car washed on the spot.

name: Terrian Patrice
text: Very clean environment and the service was great!

name: Tracy Reynolds
text: Always the best. Never disappointed!

name: Ronald Lucid
text: These guys are awesome!!!!!!! I have been going for years to them when they were on University Drive and now in Madison at there new facility.

name: Woodrow Bowling
text: My wife took her Camara there, and they stole the rear floor mats. 6 weeks later, I've heard, we ordered them and waiting for delivery...they came but to other location...you can't contact the owner because all numbers forward to the Madison site. Bad enough they stole the factory floor mats, but to have religious Christian quotes on the walls and do this! These people should be closed down.
